alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 8:45PM CDT until May 09 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Rush County in central Kansas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 845 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Rozel, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ash Valley, Timken and Shaffer. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
